text: allahuvinre peril kallam ketticcamakkukayea avanre vacanannale kallamakkittallukayea ceytavanekkal keatiya akrami arunt? avar daivattinre vidhittirppanusaricculla tannalute vihitam erruvannentivarika tanne ceyyum. annane avare marippikkanayi nam'mute dutanmar avarute atutt cellumpeal ceadikkum: "allahuve vitt ninnal viliccu prarthiccukeantirunnavar ippealevite?” avar parayum: "avareakkeyum nannale kaivittirikkunnu.” annane, tannal satyanisedhikalayirunnuvenn avar tanne tannalkketire saksyam vahikkum
